title: Waterman Family Endowed Chair for Liver Research
description: To endow a professorship in liver diseases, to provide funds for lectureships and to support research in liver disease and digestive disease at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To endow a professorship in liver diseases, to provide funds for lectureships and to support research in liver disease and digestive disease at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
